sentences: Toas oli imelikult vaikne, sest kell seisis.
context: The Estonian word 'vaikne' is an adjective that means quiet or silent. It can describe environments (a quiet room), sounds (quiet voice), people (quiet person), weather conditions (calm weather), and atmospheres (peaceful life). The word has several related meanings including being noiseless, calm without wind, gentle in movement, peaceful in character, and having little speech. In its different grammatical forms, it can modify nouns to indicate various qualities of quietness or stillness.
